TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit NameValueCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 表示可通过键或索引访问的关联 键和 值的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of associated keys and values that can be accessed either with the key or with the index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据此集合类。This collection is based on the class. 但是，与不同，此类存储单个项下的多个字符串值。However, unlike the , this class stores multiple string values under a single key. 此类可以用于标头、 查询字符串和窗体数据。This class can be used for headers, query strings and form data. 每个元素是一个键/值对。Each element is a key/value pair. 此类型的集合不会保留排序的元素，而没有特定的顺序将保证枚举该集合时。Collections of this type do not preserve the ordering of element, and no particular ordering is guaranteed when enumerating the collection. 容量是元素的数目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 哈希代码提供程序分配中的键的哈希代码。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序是。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器是。The default comparer is the . 在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，此类使用区分区域性的字符串比较。In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons. 但是，在.NET Framework 1.1 和更高版本中，此类使用比较字符串时。However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses when comparing strings. 有关如何区域性影响比较和排序的详细信息，请参阅[执行不区分区域性的字符串操作](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md)。For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md). `null` 允许作为键或值。`null` is allowed as a key or as a value. > [!CAUTION] > 方法之间没有区别`null`返回这是因为找不到指定的键和`null`因为与键关联的值返回这`null`。The method does not distinguish between `null` which is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` which is returned because the value associated with the key is `null`. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/CPP/nvc.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/CS/nvc.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/VB/nvc.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器，但是，派生的类可以创建他们自己的同步的版本使用属性类。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property of the class.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该实例为空且具有默认初始容量，并使用不区分大小写的默认哈希代码提供程序和不区分大小写的默认比较器。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default initial capacity and uses the default case-insensitive hash code provider and the default case-insensitive comparer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序分配中的键的哈希代码。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序是。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器是。The default comparer is the . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

param.span: 对象，用于确定两个键是否相等，并为集合中的键生成哈希代码。

span.span: The object to use to determine whether two keys are equal and to generate hash codes for the keys in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量对象是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a object is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 对象组合比较器和哈希代码提供程序。The object combines the comparer and the hash code provider. 哈希代码提供程序分配中的键的哈希代码。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序分配中的键的哈希代码。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序是。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器是。The default comparer is the . 新元素按与源相同的顺序进行排序。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order as the source . 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`col`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `col`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序分配中的键的哈希代码。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序是。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器是。The default comparer is the . 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`. 如果中的元素数`col`大于`capacity`，此构造函数会成为 O (`n` + `m`) 操作，其中`n`是`capacity`和`m`是数中的元素`col`。If the number of elements in `col` is greater than `capacity`, this constructor becomes an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is `capacity` and `m` is the number of elements in `col`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中的键`c`目标中已存在实例中的关联的值`c`将添加到现有值与目标中相同的键关联的以逗号分隔列表实例。If a key in `c` already exists in the target instance, the associated value in `c` is added to the existing comma-separated list of values associated with the same key in the target instance. 如果已经等于容量的容量增加通过自动重新分配在内部数组和现有元素被复制到新数组中，在添加新的元素之前。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小于容量，此方法为 o （1） 运算。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加以容纳新元素，此方法会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: The collection is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标中已存在指定的键实例，指定的值添加到现有的表单中的值以逗号分隔列表`"value1,value2,value3"`。If the specified key already exists in the target instance, the specified value is added to the existing comma-separated list of values in the form `"value1,value2,value3"`. 值是与目标中相同的键关联实例。The values are associated with the same key in the target instance. 如果已经等于容量的容量增加通过自动重新分配在内部数组和现有元素被复制到新数组中，在添加新的元素之前。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小于容量，此方法为 o （1） 运算。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加以容纳新元素，此方法会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: The collection is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该集合为空，此方法将返回一个空数组，而不`null`。If the collection is empty, this method returns an empty array, not `null`. 返回的数组被缓存以提高性能，但当集合更改将自动刷新。The arrays returned by are cached for better performance and are automatically refreshed when the collection changes. 派生的类可以使缓存的版本失效通过调用，从而强制阵列可以重新创建。A derived class can invalidate the cached version by calling , thereby forcing the arrays to be recreated. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 无法设置此属性。This property cannot be set. 若要设置指定索引处的值，使用`Item[GetKey(index)]`。To set the value at a specified index, use `Item[GetKey(index)]`. C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索指定索引处的值是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`值的数量。Retrieving the values at the specified index is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[name]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[name]`. 如果集合中已存在指定的键，设置此属性将使用指定的值覆盖现有值的列表。If the specified key already exists in the collection, setting this property overwrites the existing list of values with the specified value. 若要将新值追加到现有的值列表，请使用方法。To append the new value to the existing list of values, use the method. 如果集合中不存在指定的键，设置此属性创建一个使用指定的键与指定的值的新条目。If the specified key does not exist in the collection, setting this property creates a new entry using the specified key and the specified value. > [!CAUTION] > 此属性返回`null`在以下情况： 1) 如果找不到指定的键;和 2） 如果找到指定的键，其关联的值为`null`。This property returns `null` in the following cases: 1) if the specified key is not found; and 2) if the specified key is found and its associated value is `null`. 此属性不区分两种情况。This property does not distinguish between the two cases. C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索或设置与指定键关联的值是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`值的数量。Retrieving or setting the values associated with the specified key is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of values.

exception.span: 该集合是只读的，但此操作尝试修改该集合。

span.span: The collection is read-only and the operation attempts to modify the collection.

summary.span: 移除 实例中具有指定键的项。

span.span: Removes the entries with the specified key from the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不具有指定键，包含的元素保持不变。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: The collection is read-only.
